thread.title: Basic but not depressing. Perfect for budget travel.
thread.title_full: Basic but not depressing. Perfect for budget travel. - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: alexbluemoon
title: Basic but not depressing. Perfect for budget travel.
text: Everything was swell. Totally tiny rooms but that's fine, you're out and about in the city. Very basic but with some sense of style. Comfortable beds and quiet. I'd stay there again if traveling solo or with one of my kids. I'd probably get the bigger room/bed if I was there with my wife.
